name: Stay Dreamin
description:
Welcome to Stay Dreamin

Stay Dreamin is a small game I made for a game jam taking place at a student organization in my university. The objective of this game is to stay dreaming as long as possible by using the left and right arrow keys to punch oncoming walking alarm clocks that will wake you up if you collide with them. Make sure to time your punches correctly, as you will only punch once as you tap any of the keys. 

Credits and Special Thanks

Programming by me :)

Art by me :)

Music from Little Big Planet 2, Sonic The Fighters

Sound from Sound Bible, Sonic The Fighters

Special thanks to the folks at Spartasoft who started this game jam :)

Notes

I made this game in one night.
